TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_duma, title = duma, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/duma} }

S.FORM: zuma (kamu nu hulam: ) izau ku zuma u nu kilangay ku sapi saluma' a luma'. . u zuma ku zikuc nu Sakizaya. . u zuma ku la'cus nu balucu' niza. . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
